Welcome to Dublin, TX!
Welcome to Dublin, TX!

[![](../ic?i=info&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Public Hearings & Notices](https://www.ci.dublin.tx.us/notices)[![](../ic?i=book&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Agendas & Minutes](https://www.ci.dublin.tx.us/agendasandminutes)[![](../ic?i=faucet&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Pay Utilities](javascript:;)[![](../ic?i=gavel&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Pay Municipal Court Fines](javascript:;)[![](../ic?i=pencil&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Forms & Permits](https://www.ci.dublin.tx.us/formsandpermits)[![](../ic?i=convo&c2=%23194d13&c3=%23ededed)Submit Feedback](https://www.ci.dublin.tx.us/submitfeedback)

Greetings and thanks to all who visit our official website for the City of Dublin, Texas. We are located in Central Texas, in the southwest corner of Erath County. That's about two hours south of the DFW Metroplex, one hour east of Abilene, and two hours northwest of Austin.
===================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================

City News

<mwjspost-obj></mwjspost-obj><script type="module">import MwJsPost from "https://app.membershipware.com/api/public/mwjsPost?pt=N&et=KFm6cGEx4qcGbJ72apxGSA%3d%3d&eb=YInP4malAS62iyGi0ii55w%3d%3d&tg=";</script>

<mwjscalendar-obj></mwjscalendar-obj><script type="module">import mwjsCalendar from "https://app.membershipware.com/api/public/mwjsPost?c=Y&sd=first&et=KFm6cGEx4qcGbJ72apxGSA%3d%3d&eb=CobSx6j12mcK02FzOWNhcg%3d%3d&tg=&xtg=";</script>

Legendary golfer Ben Hogan lived here as a child, Dublin Bottling Works continues to produce a robust line of pure cane sugar sodas (after bottling Dr Pepper for 120 years), and, in 2005, Governor Rick Perry signed a bill designating us the official Irish Capital of Texas.    
  
We are a diverse group of citizens, families, farmers, businesspeople, artisans, and town folk who currently number just under 4,000 in town and 9,000 in our zip code. Come on by and get to know us!

![](https://www.ci.dublin.tx.us/api/blob/viewBlob?i=Hd%252Bk3YPs3UmleGFpQtGuX0ZrODDGToiKQ7FHVtEC0U2CIIyNeCy%252BqvGCJhq3Z3Cv&s=large)

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
